resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign up here.
We\'ve just sent you a confirmation email. Head over to your inbox to verify and activate your account(Worry not, its only a one time thing).
You need an internet connection to sign up.
We may not be able to continue with some of the details you\\\'ve passed. Perhaps that email is already in use.
We\'ve sent you an email for verification. The app will automatically detect that you\'re verified and you will be able to access and use the app.
Don\'t have an account? Sign up here.
You need an internet connection to login.
Your connection may have a few problems.
You may have mistyped your email and/or password. The app is having a hard time authenticating you.
To continue, you need to first verify your email address. The app will automatically detect that you\'re verified and you\'ll be able to use the app.
